Package no.uib.jsparklines.renderers.util

Class StatisticalBarChartColorRenderer

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.renderer.AbstractRenderer
org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.AbstractCategoryItemRenderer
org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.BarRenderer
org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.StatisticalBarRenderer
no.uib.jsparklines.renderers.util.StatisticalBarChartColorRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, org.jfree.chart.LegendItemSource, org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRenderer, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable
public class StatisticalBarChartColorRenderer
extends org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.StatisticalBarRenderer
Custom renderer making it possible to use different colors for individual data bars in statistical bar charts.
Author:
Harald Barsnes
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • StatisticalBarChartColorRenderer

      public StatisticalBarChartColorRenderer​(ArrayList<Color> colors)
      Creates a new renderer.
      Parameters:
      colors - the colors to use.

    • StatisticalBarChartColorRenderer

      public StatisticalBarChartColorRenderer​(Color color)
      Creates a new renderer. Use this when all the bars are to have the same color.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to use.

  • Method Details

    • getItemPaint

      public Paint getItemPaint​(int row, int column)
      Returns the color for an item. Overrides the default behavior inherited from AbstractSeriesRenderer.
      Specified by:
      getItemPaint in interface org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRenderer
      Overrides:
      getItemPaint in class org.jfree.chart.renderer.AbstractRenderer
      Parameters:
      row - the series.
      column - the category.
      Returns:
      the item color.

    • drawBackground

      public void drawBackground​(Graphics2D g2, org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot plot, Rectangle2D dataArea)
      Overwritten method in order to not draw the background wall. Note that the method is thus empty and draws nothing.
      Specified by:
      drawBackground in interface org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRenderer
      Overrides:
      drawBackground in class org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.AbstractCategoryItemRenderer
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      plot - the plot.
      dataArea - the area inside the axes.
